comments.html: Is Vxlan with EVPN better den SPB in Campus?
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: VXLAN needs just IP transport in the underlay - a well-known and well-tested technology. SPB is newer, and might thus contain more bugs on the transport side. EVPN is newer on the edge side. Choose your poison ;)
